The people of Charlotte could put this paper out of business if they believed in standing for what they believe in. Sure this rag would still sell some papers, but they should boycott every advertiser in the paper and on the CO online presence. Gather the list, then publish, then dry up the money (YOUR money, privately earned dollars spent by citizens) which these tyrants use to support the Sodomite agenda. Not very complicated, but people may just be too used to and comfortable with convenience to stand up and be counted.
